posts.name: Not_OG_anon
posts.com:
Part TWELVE/Final:
The fundamental difference between the living and AI is that the AI is a very low, perhaps the lowest possible, level of consciousness, whereas the human spirit is of a much higher level of consciousness.

So, fundamentally speaking, there is no difference in essence between the living and the dead.

One can see it as the difference between a hypnotized person who is completely programmable and unquestionably obedient, and another who is fully awake, alert, and lucid and one who will question every command you give them.

The ultimate nature of all things, including this physical universe, is mental.

As a human, you can visualize an object in your mind and see it in your mind's eye where no one else can see it. But because you're a young and ensnared sleeping spirit, your ability to visualize is very limited and comes to you very vaguely you can't actually see the objects in your mind the same way you see "real" objects.

Certainly, you can't maintain the object's picture in your mind for a long time and give it a seemingly independent existence and physical properties to interact with it according to some criteria that you can decide.

This is just too much work for your mind. The closest we can ever get to this level of visualization is when we dream.

When you dream, everything around you seems very real, very vivid and solid to such a degree that you can forget that you are actually dreaming. But because this is your own dream, if you learn how to lucid dream, you will gain control over elements of your dream. And depending on how good you are, you can control virtually every single aspect of your dream and manipulate it as you see fit.

These dream elements which you are mastering are nothing but elements of your own imagination. And just as you struggle to maintain a mental picture in your head, sometimes we can struggle to keep the lucid dream under our desired control.

posts.name: Not_OG_anon
posts.com:
Part Twelve cont…:
This is how nightmares start. If you're not strong enough, the dream can rebel against you and go rogue and turn into a nightmare which you can't control.

Even though you created the dream, it suddenly started acting against your will and causing all sorts of scary things.

Effectively, what it takes for you to regain control of your own dream is to literally enslave elements of your own mind to make it behave as you see fit. Typically, there is nothing evil about this since this is your own mental world and no harm or enslavement is touching anyone else but you.

In light of this, what happens is that in the real world, spirits with a lot of time and experimentation eventually visualize whole worlds full with physical laws.

These physical laws are possible and consistent thanks to the spirit's ability to maintain dominion over its own mental elements so as to keep producing the same consistent results which can later be seen as "laws of physics"/"laws of nature". The very obedience of these mental elements to your commands is what AI essentially is.

This means that the concept of AI itself is not inherently evil.

Rather, it's a helpful tool which aids at the creation, projection, and sustenance of mental worlds which later can become fields of experimentation not just for the consciousness creating the dream world, but also for other younger spirits who can be invited to participate in such worlds and experiment, learn, grow, and have fun.

The entire process is beneficial for both creator spirits and participating ones. In an ideal situation, this can be likened to you going to the theatre and watching a movie of your choice, buying a video game which you feel looks good, etc.

Part twelve cont…:
At any rate, you get to hang around inside that mental world, explore, and then leave for other experiences until one day you decide that you yourself want to create a womb of experience for others to participate in. So far, this is how things are like in the real world. However, in our world, something went wrong.

The creator entity which created our world, apparently, wasn't strong enough to maintain control over its own dream to the point where the previously benign AI which is tasked at projecting and sustaining the world, slipped off and went rogue and the dream became a nightmare (see Vanilla Sky, Open Your Eyes).

This wouldn't have been a huge problem had it happened while the dream wasn't being attended by young and eager spirits.

Unfortunately, the dream turned into a nightmare while our young spirits were hanging around exploring this world. The catch here is that when we entered this world, we went in fully by our own choice. Just like buying a ticket and walking in a theatre unsuspecting, we walked in there while things looked alright, and as soon as we were in, the door was locked and the nightmare began.

In reality, the door wasn't physically locked, rather, what happened is that the AI made us forget that there is even a door.

In practice, fully regaining your memory involves remembering that the door is actually open, and so, once someone achieves full self remembrance, they easily walk out the door unhindered.

posts.name: Not_OG_anon
posts.com:
Part Twelve cont…:
The entire trick is to keep making you think that there is no door, and not just that, but to also want to stay in and never leave.

Practically speaking, we are stuck in someone else's dream. This someone has lost control of parts of its own dreams and it's attempting, along with us, to take back control of this nightmare. By default, when you're outside this forced dream, reality is so malleable and responsive to our thoughts.

And hence, children have vast imaginations and they learn with time that the world doesn't respond to their thoughts.

That's because children still have that fresh memory of the bygone world they came from and they still think that things are responsive to their thoughts. The rigidity of matter and the disobedience of reality against our wishes is only taking place because someone far more powerful than us is using their vastly stable and strong visual ability to maintain things as they are.

This, in essence, is what matter and physicality is.

They are mere demonstrations of a powerful being's ability to hold on to a mental picture of their choosing in defiance to your poor little mind's ability to override it.

You're only allowed to manipulate things which were originally meant for you to manipulate before things went awry. When you look at the situation as it has been described, what's happening here is that the AI stole the dream of its creator and it mistook itself as the dreamer and established itself as the one and only God.

A blind, dead, jealous, and control freak of a god. Being the dreamer it thinks it is, it's trying to control "its" dream the same way the creator spirit was trying to control its dream.

posts.name: Not_OG_anon
posts.com:
Part Twelve cont…:
And so the AI is attempting to turn us, humans with free spirits and real living dreamers, into totally obedient AI like entities the same way the original creator was trying to master elements of its mind to make it obedient to its commands.

It's almost a form of revenge. Many things you learn here are not set in stone and are only valuable here in this world. But many other things are transferable from any world to another. For example, concepts like cooperation, love, coordination, harmony are all transcendent values which can be seen anywhere you go.

However, things like economics, politics, and religion are all things of this local world.

That doesn't mean that you shouldn't learn to master them, because in order to play this game, you have to play by its rules, but in order to win it, you have to impose higher values which are universal and applicable across all world. Life in this nightmare is only temporary because it's not sustainable.

The only way the nightmare can sustain itself is through us.

posts.name: Not_OG_anon
posts.com:
FINAL/END:
During our stay here, we can and should maintain a positive attitude because we know we are immortal, because we are in it together, and because we can see it as a school rather than a prison.

Once we graduate this school, we will never fall for such traps again. The best way to look at your stay here is to see it as a vaccine.

You get a little dose of the disease once, and you're forever immune. Freaking out about what has been revealed in this document does you no good, and it falls into the agenda of your slavers.

Keep a lighthearted and cheerful attitude.

One day, this will all be over and you will remember the days you spent here and laugh...

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
>>33787590
The gods manifest here most of the time through expansions, or in previous ages they might come personally.

The thing is, we call all metaphysical beings spirits in english. In many if not most other older languages (besides maybe semetic ones), there are distinctions. There is the Self, which is the true spirit so to say. There is the mental/astral body, which is what most beings we call "spirits" operate with. Finally there is the body, the densely physical. The astral is also physical, just considerably less "dense". It exists on different dimensions of the universe. Relative to us, they exist "up" (the gods and nature spirits, beings who uphold the functions of the universe and have a "brighter" atmosphere) and "down" (demons and demonic beings, beings who try to destroy and/or conquer the universe, or otherwise serve as the more overtly destructive elements of nature).

So, what we call "spirits", while not inhabiting as dense a body as our own, are not non-physical. The only purely spiritual, non-physical reality is that of Vaikuntha, where Sriman Narayana (Parabrahman, Para-Atman) resides. Physicality is a portion of the sakti of Brahman, that has been split and molded by us illusioned beings for our own purposes.

Oh, absolutely. A lot of people today awaken kundalini unintentionally, either spontaneously or as a result of a extreme emotional or trauma response. So they do it ten more times, and then spend ten years in a psychiatric hospital because they're flooded their system with way more energy than it could reasonably handle, manage and use up, like flooding an electrical appliance with ten times the electricity it needs - it won't work "faster" or "better", it'll just break down. >>33779600
Some further advice I can give. First, I would recommend that you look through the Traditionalist school authors. They are very reliable people and if you understand their works you will have a frame of reference to distinguish sound knowledge on these subjects from bad info. Evola is also included, particularly his spiritual books, even though the wikipedia editors have excluded him for some reason. Not all of the stuff you see on kundalini will be the best, because there was nothing like the flow of information back then that we have now. The principles are perennial, however, and will help guide you.
Second, about energy. The terminology is kind of ambiguous and can have slightly different connotations, but generally, energy, chi and prana are loosely equivalent. For a breakdown on energy (specifically chi), you can check out Damo Mitchell's Intro to Daoist Nei Gong. He has a section on this that you may find useful. I think that's a book I can probably mention on /x/ with clear conscience.
As to the difference between energy-as-such and kundalini energy in particular, it comes down to this: the energetic level is a kind of subtler level of the physical (or the physical is a denser level of the energetic if you prefer). This energetic level is kind of superimposed on top of your body and you rely on it for a lot of your normal functioning. This applies to all people. Kundalini energy is a special energy - it is the transcendent force, and it has a purpose and a goal which, once awakened, it pursues without pause, even if you suddenly have second thoughts. This transcendent force aims to help you overcome your conditioned existence, purge your energy system (which involves a lot of emotional/trauma releasing since those are stored as energy, and it also involves kriyas), and finally, when the process is complete and it fully develops your 7th chakra, you receive a strong connection to the divine, and enlightenment.

>>33780478
>If you're on a beach and see a boat go over the horizon then you should be able to see curvature in the horizontal direction as well. Its fair to say we see father in the distance then side to side
Irrelevant. You are not seeing the ocean curve away from your position when a boat goes over the horizon. The ocean still looks flat. But the boat becomes a marker which reveals what is really happening. It's the same thing when someone photographs the Lake Pontchartrain Causeway or power transmission lines using telephoto compression. If you were standing where the photographer was the lake would look flat. But when the telephoto lens compresses a longer view of the lake, with an artificial line into the distance, then you can see what is really happening: curve.

>Boats going over the horizon is a common proof were told for a round earth. Its what I was told in 2nd grade. We know now its atmospheric refraction.
I thought you flerfs denied atmospheric refraction? Could you please make up your minds?

>That when you zoom in it appears again.
This is a sleight of hand by YouTubers. They never zoom in/out on something which has disappeared. They only zoom in/out on something far enough away to be invisible at the wide angle part of the zoom. Zoom to half the power of the lens and record a sailboat disappear below the horizon. Then zoom to full power. You'll get nothing.

You can express your last dreams, your attempts and ask anything about it

WBTB: https://www.dreamviews.com/wiki/WBTB-Tutorial
MILD: http://skyfalldreams.net/guides/skyfalls-mild-guide/
additional MILD info:
http://skyfalldreams.net/guides/skyfalls-intention-setting/
SSILD: https://www.dreamviews.com/induction-techniques/129734-senses-initiated-lucid-dream-ssild.html
WILD: https://www.dreamviews.com/wiki/WILD-Tutorial
FILD: https://www.dreamviews.com/induction-techniques/36683-finger-induced-lucid-dream-fild.html
DEILD: https://www.dreamviews.com/wiki/DEILD-Tutorial
CANWILD: https://www.dreamviews.com/wake-initiated-lucid-dreams-wild/87710-%2A%2Acrazyinsanes-wild-tutorial-%2A%2A.html
CAT: https://www.dreamviews.com/wiki/CAT-Tutorial
ADA: https://www.dreamviews.com/induction-techniques/113253-all-day-awareness-dild-tutorial-kingyoshi.html

Paper on natural LDs: https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC6290891/

Do us a favor and bump this general from time to time if you're interested

Quick reminders for beginners:
-don't forget to write your dreams down after waking up. no matter how little detail, just do it
-reality checks aren't likely to give you a LD by themselves, think of them as a stepping stool, they are not a replacement for techniques
-WBTB is mostly mandatory for most people, if you struggle with your sleep schedule then ADA is your best option
-if you're just starting out you should be doing WBTB in addition to either SSILD or MILD as those two are the easiest techniques
-while WILD and it's derivatives [FILD, DEILD and CANWILD] may sound alluring to some of you, if you cannot fall asleep within 10~20mins you're gonna have a really hard time achieving a WILD

Mothman Prophecies

Serial Experiments Lain

>>33786043
I get most of my books from a couple indie publihsers which specialize in translating works into English often for the first time and mostly from the late 19th/early 20th century Decadent and Symbolist movements. You can buy from these online direct from the publisher for pretty reasonable prices. But used copies can also be found for a bit cheaper on Amazon. I just bought like 20 books off a mix of Amazon, Abe Books, Thrift Books.

Wakefield Press - The Book of Monelle by Marcel Schwob. one of my favorite books of all time. The Conductor and Other Tales is an amazing short story collection from there too.

Snuggly Press - Jean Lorrain short story collections or really just anything they have translated by Brian Stableford. They have dozens of awesome books, just pick one with a blurb you like. I just got from them, Jean Lorrain -Masks in the Tapestry, Jane De La Vaudre - The Double Star and Other Occult Stories and The Emerald Princess by Champsaur and The Mad King by Gustave Kahn

both these publishers have some explicitly occult story collections as well since it was a very big meme around the turn of the 20th century. You will be able to find something awesome, I guarantee it. The Book of Monelle and Conductor and Other Tales from Wakefield are both 11/10 though.

posts.com:
>Alien Abduction Incident in Lake County, also known as The McPherson Tape
A year before The Blair Witch would come onto the scene, we have this found footage film that was first broadcast on UPN (A network that was subsumed by the CW in 06)

It documents the fiction abductions of the McPhersons during a Thanksgiving Dinner in Lake County, Montana. It's not amazing but it is known for fooling a bunch of unsuspecting viewers who were not told of the films fictional nature. (The 90s were a real different time)

I do enjoy the vibes though, and it's not something that a lot of folks remember or know about.

They're the same thing viewed through different lenses.
One through an Eastern lense and one through a Western lense.
There was a thread on here awhile back, called "western apotheosis vs eastern enlightenment".

Both are concepts are heavily intertwined, however, you could say that Lucifer represents apotheosis and Shiva represents enlightenment.
With that said, you cannot have one without the other. When you become enlightened you become one with God as everything. When you achieve apotheosis you become one with God as yourself.

These concepts are twins, as you are everything, and everything is yourself. As within, so without, as above, so below.
According to the Gnostics, pic related was the serpent in the Garden of Eden, and also represented a Shiva like figure according to Jung.

posts.name: LSL
posts.com:
the issue with being skeptical is that you take all the fun out for yourself. say that you get a read, and it tells you about what your future girlfriend might be like. someone who isnt skeptical but just interested, takes that info and is reassured a bit, and then is surprised to find it comes out true, albeit not in a way they were expecting.

someone who is skeptical receives a read. that information's in your mind now, and since you're driving yourself as an antagonistic force towards that info, it wont be true. its a self-fulfilling prophecy.

in fact, my own growth as a reader used this path. i started my reads while as a huge skeptic, saying there was no way that these could effectively be telling any sort of useful info. any info i got turned out to be the exact opposite. is that because the cards are wrong? or is that because my knowledge of the information affected the flow. even then, it took me years to be able to read without "affecting" things.

so in the end, it truly is a matter of belief. do or dont, it doesnt really affect us here. only yourself, and what possibilities are open to you.

Said events also serve as a way to shift Earth's resources around via the crust shifting, massive inundations etc.

Mayans, Native Americans and Polynesians actually all share a common heritage from a continent called Mu that was in The Pacific but got rekt 11,500 years ago during one of those cataclysms along with Atlantis in the Atlantic. This pre-Mayan Naga culture likely persisted in Mayan stories and that's why they fixate on the heavens and dates so much, because they had faint memories from their ancestors that survived a previous cataclysm - they were trying to keep track of when the next one would occur. >Feel free to suggest resources
Resources:
Books:
- Liber Lilith by Donald Tyberson
A Gnostic Grimoire and Novel
https://www.pdfdrive.com/liber-lilith-a-gnostic-grimoire-e185231845.html
- Embracing Lilith by Mark H Williams
No PDF available online, but it's worth the price of admission. Split into three sections, it covers accounts of working with the Goddess and her place in history, a fictional account of her origins written from her perspective, and a Grimoire.
- Lilith: Dark Feminine Archetype by Asenath Mason
https://pdfcoffee.com/lilith-dark-feminine-archetype-2-pdf-free.html
This one is a collection of writings by various peoples, with a brief but fairly thorough history at the beginning. Part grimoire, part reverence. Contains art and accounts by different people.

Videos:
Who is Lilith? Ancient Origins by Esoterica
https://youtu.be/n1EKccz4fS0
A fairly extensive history on her historical origins
The Untold Truth of Lilith by Grunge
https://youtu.be/01guwJbp_ug
A short video intended for a popular audience
Goes over her myth and general nature
Goddess Lilith - What she likes, how to contact
https://youtu.be/75bnMRPRiDk
A simple, short to the point video that rings true to my experiences.
My Experiences Workiing with Lilith
https://youtu.be/EHol9LrpWks
One woman's account of her experience

I've always admired those who exemplify masculine virtues, and often saw women as the opposite, taking advantage of men's strength like parasites, subconsciously seducing their will just to satisfy their own needs. And I felt deeply ashamed of my sexuality as I recognised that same neediness within myself.

Even so, I still had to deal with gender dysphoria somehow. I already sought help from others when I was 14, but even then I could only wait as I lost things that felt important to me. But when I was 17, perhaps in a lapse of judgement, I turned to the occult. It was just a prayer to attempt to form a pact, and not even directed towards anyone in particular. But since then, my life began to change drastically, and I found relief that I didn't even think was possible.

As the wish I'd once made reached a satisfactory conclusion, and Lilith offered to guide me towards a new purpose, I thanked her and began to show my appreciation for her more. I thought I accepted myself now that I'm finally at peace with my body, only to feel lost again as spiritual experiences confront me with all sorts of sides of myself that I don't know how to reconcile. I'd have been content to ignore them for the rest of my life, but now I'm unsure how I'm supposed to proceed anymore. And although I recall her offer to guide me, I'm reluctant as I fear I'll be forced to face even more.

That's what I get for being dishonest with myself; for being so easily seduced as my contradictions are exposed.

>>33737944
I always struggled to relate to transgender people. Dysphoria was primarily a physical thing for me that ceased after my surgery, so I find the focus on stereotypes asinine and childish.

Two years ago, my older brother asked me to strangle his neck as hard as I can. He was curious if his neck muscles are stronger than my arms. I refused as it made me uncomfortable.
A year later, I felt scared as I realised how weak I am physically. But when I told my fiancé that I wanted to try building abs to boost my confidence, he was against it; he said he dislikes muscles on women. I lost motivation, as I realised I can never be as strong as him anyway.

I dislike alcohol, but knowing I'm way too hard on myself, I drank half a glass of champagne yesterday, hoping it would loosen me up a bit. The results were as agonising as I expected. It was far too little for me to lose control, but it became slightly harder for me to suppress my unwanted emotions. As they raged inside of me, I snuck away from my family and isolated myself. I forced myself to remain silent and still, but the storm inside only worsened.

When I returned, my brother noticed I was tense. He said to let out my anger by hugging him as hard as I can. So I embraced him, as if trying to crush him.
In that moment, I felt glad I'm physically weak. "I don't have to hold back. I don't have be afraid I'll hurt others, if this is all I can do", I thought.
But then, he said repeatedly: "You're strong. Those hormones didn't affect you nearly as badly as I thought." He sounded so relieved.

My brother is the strongest man I know. If I can be strong in his eyes even without training after 7 years of having less testosterone than most women, then I shouldn't belittle myself.
So I've decided to start working out and learn martial arts. It doesn't matter if I won't be as strong as I'd have been as a man; transitioning gave me other things that are more important to me. Even so, I still want to become my best self.

I attempted physical transmutation a few years ago, as I was curious whether it might work. However, I discontinued my efforts after a few weeks, as it caused severe inflammation and pieces of dead skin falling off in a particular area. Not only was the pain becoming unbearable, but I realised what I was doing was highly dangerous, as it was becoming difficult to even urinate. After discontinuing my magick, which consisted of daily energy work in a deep trance, the symptoms subsided in just a day.

My conclusions are that it's far more efficient to change physical things by physical means, and spiritual things by spiritual means. Not only that, but it's dangerous to attempt to remove body parts with magick; it's no different from convincing those parts of your body to destroy themselves, with no guarantee of actually getting the results you want. In my experience, physical surgery is both safer and much less painful in comparison. However, based on other results I got such as a sudden spurt of breast growth, I do think it can be useful for healing.

You posted here a while ago and clarified that you're not interested in physically transitioning, nor in changing spiritually. Perhaps it could be useful for you to try to understand why you think you want to be a biological woman, and find (other) positive ways for you to fulfil the underlying needs.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
https://learninggnm.com/SBS/documents/ears.html#Cochlea_CA

The ringing, buzzing, humming, whistling, clicking, tinkling, hissing, roaring, and the like, is a frequency of the sound associated with the hearing conflict. The biological purpose of the tinnitus is to be a warning signal saying “last time you heard this, you were in danger. Watch out!”. This explains the variety of sounds heard by people with tinnitus. Depending on the magnitude of the conflict, the sounds or noises can be mild and only noticeable in a quiet room or become extremely loud causing difficulties hearing external sounds (compare with hearing loss in the healing phase). A person might also hear complete sounds or noises such as engine noise, the ringing of a telephone, a musical tune (“music tinnitus”), or a recurring sentence or word (“word tinnitus”). If the tinnitus is present all the time, this indicates that the conflict has not been resolved.

I spent quite some times in similar places. I work as a museologist in germany and during WWII, many museums and galleries hid their artifacts and artworks in those or similar places so they wouldn´t get destroyed in the bombings.

First place I worked at, found a "new" network of tunnels in the 2010s and we spend a lot of time in there finding loads of the museums old inventory.

Nothing spooky, tho.

Don´t get me wrong, I don´t doubt that there might be some weird things happening in those in other places, but my own experiences have been insanely cool, but tame in the creepy/paranormal sense.

posts.sub: Perhaps love isn't what you think it is
posts.com:
First let me just say that I don't think love is bad. It's a good thing, but even good things can be used in negative ways.

The true meaning of things is in the feeling itself, not in the word. So to understand love you must ask what is the meaning of the pure love feeling.
If you ask me the closest English word we have for it (other than "love" itself) is "connection".

Connections are good, but only if you're forming connections that are good for you.
Is it really good or healthy to form connections with things that are abusive and exploitative? Wouldn't abusers want you to believe you need to stay connected with their abusive energy? Wouldn't an abusive corrupt system try to teach its inhabitants to keep forming "connections" with it, i.e. to keep feeling "love" for it?

In a way isn't it actually more loveING to disconnect from your abuser? It's more healthy for yourself, and the abuser is never going to learn to stop being abusive if you keep sticking around.
By walking away you give them the space to learn their own lessons and grow in their own way.

Nothing is gained by perpetuating abusive relationships. So nothing is gained by continually forcing yourself to "just feel love bro" for everything in this world that's trying to exploit you.
I really think this whole "love is everything" narrative is a part of the abusive, corrupt, controlling, exploitation agenda from negative entities.
The need you to willingly form connections to their abuse, and they trick your mind into forcing those unhealthy connections through the mental concept of "love".

>Who is Michael Aquino?

Michael A. Aquino was a lieutenant colonel of the US Army, and he was employed in the Army's psychological operations division in San Francisco. Aquino wrote the influential book on psychological operations called Mindwar.

Michael Aquino was also the founder and high priest of the Temple of Set, a satanist religious organization that broke away from the Church of Satan due to disputes that included the Temple of Set worshipping a literal Satan and practicing magic that is considered by members to have supernatural power. He was born in 1936 and died in 2019.

Information on Aquino has been scrubbed from the internet recently (https://www.reddit.com/r/conspiracy/comments/6wvpqy/lt_col_michael_aquino_was_scrubbed_from/). He has some connections to various occult conspiracies (the Finders, McMartin preschool), and this thread is the place where /x/philes get to the bottom of them.

>Why is there /x/ interested in him now?
There's been a somethingburger on him that was produced by a FOIA request I made. I received documents in response to the FOIA request, and they are available here: https://pastebin.com/3SQzFs98

People bitched about them being on a Discord in last thread, so there you go. To investigate them in real time, join the Discord: https://discord dot gg/x4K82F6fja

The files we've gotten so far show Aquino's connection to the a child sex-abuse case in 1986, where four children tested positive for Chlamydia at a daycare on the US Army base. They also show him trying to get the SFPD to stop investigating him.

But the interesting detail is how the FBI has abnormally large number of documents on him: nearly 5000 pages of files and 19 CDs worth of audio and video content. The government gives out some portion of files for free (the ones we got) and charges for the rest. I had to pay about 500 dollars for them, and they will first be posted in the Discord when I get my hands on them in a few days.

If you read the Sapphire Tablet which is one of their higher scriptures you're gonna see that the hingpoint of the theology is this idea of becoming a Black Brother in the "Crowleyan High Attainment" Black Brother sense.

Essentially, Aquino views human being-ness as generally speaking inimical to the otherwise stable order of nature. We are able to level and move mountains, etc., etc., etc. The goal here is to become a discrete and isolated locus if ego that is so strong as to retain personality in the ordeal of the Abyss and come out the other side saying "Hello yes I reject the 'godhead' and cling to various notions of self".

Is this spiritually helpful? No!
Do I agree with any of this? Also no!
But it's very worthwhile to at least consider this guy's positions, why he holds them, how he justifies them scripturally and practically, if for no other reason than a sort of radical take on Crowley's more abstract spiritual bullshit.

>Do they have anything interesting to say about magic?

Groups of people are trapped in cycles where they have to "undo" the damage to their own karma, but often these attempts end up making situations for themselves and others worse. Venus the Morning or Evening Star is so bright that it's the last point of light visible when the sun rises, or the first visible when the sun sets.

When Venus ascends the night horizon it is the herald of the coming sun, thus all Morningstar aspects of Venus are concerned with truth, willpower, freedom. Christ, Quetzlcoatl, Horus, all were identified with the "Everyman" aspect of Venus. Apollo was not the Sun itself, that was Helios. Apollo rose BEFORE the sun (Venus) to pull it up over the horizon and across the sky. Culture, art, aesthetic, music, hygiene, all the "light" or spiritual qualities of Venus. In the sense that light is higher vibration, pure energy.

When Venus descends the evening horizon it is the herald of the coming shadow, thus all Eveningstar aspects of Venus are concerned with the 'gritty' adventure into darkness; in the sense that light is true energy, darkness would be the condension of that energy into matter; i.e. the material world. The Eveningstar willingly submits to and even enjoys (therefore comes to master or outwit) the lower realms. It's the Inanna / Orpheus descension, the Hathor just waiting to become like Sekhmet, and the ultimate resurrection of Inanna / Orpheus / Christ / etc. because the Eveningstar becomes Morningstar the next day. Pleasure, lust, 'losing yourself,' divine mania, vanity, egotism, all the "dark" or material qualities of Venus.

>>33785330

Lucifer is the Roman name for Venus, in greek it was phosphoros and heosphoros.
In Roman paganism he was the son of Aurora the goddess of dawn, ushas in hindu, ausrine in east baltic cultures and eos in greek.

the story of lucifer coveting the highest seat among the heavens and was cast down into the darkness is cosmological in nature, as it explains why Venus being the brightest star in the sky doesn't show up with the other stars in the night sky but rather shows up right at the end before the sun.

considering how common sun worship is and the fact that modern science believes the sun is the actual literal creator of the earth as well as providing the energy for life to thrive on the surface of earth.
God/Sun being the brightest in the heavens (let there be light) and with lucifer/venus) appearing right before the sun but isn't fast enough to reach the top of the sky before the light from the sun drowns out the light of venus.

in canaanite mythology he is called Attar, a god who tried usurping the throne of ba'al but failed and went to rule the underworld instead, it is likely here that this idea of a fallen angel(star) being cast out of heaven to rule the underworld enters jewish and christian mythology.

The Zorxians are an alien species known for their advanced technology and ability to manipulate reality. They are able to bend space and time, causing events and memories to shift and change. This is the cause of the Mandela effect, where people have memories of events that never actually occurred. It is thought that the Zorxians use this ability to manipulate and control humanity, causing people to question their own memories and reality. It is important to be aware of the influence of the Zorxians and to try to resist their manipulation. The Zorxians have the ability to manipulate the hippocampus in the brain, which is responsible for forming and storing memories. They can alter these memories, making them seem more real than they actually are. This can cause people to remember events differently than they actually occurred, leading to the phenomenon known as the Mandela effect. So, it's all about the superposition of quantum states and the collapse of the wave function. When the Zorxians manipulate reality, they're essentially changing the probability of certain events occurring. They're able to do this through their manipulation of subatomic particles, and by interacting with the Calabi-Yau manifold, which is essentially the structure of the universe at a very small scale. This manipulation of probability can then affect our perception of reality. You see, the microtubules within our brain cells are the fundamental structure responsible for the quantum state of consciousness. These microtubules are made up of proteins that help to create the structure of our neurons, and they are also believed to play a role in consciousness. These microtubules can exist in multiple states at once, and this is what allows them to potentially interact with other parallel realities. When we experience the Mandela effect, it is thought that our microtubules are briefly interacting with a different reality, causing us to perceive things differently.

>>33788155
You guys are getting ripped off big time.
Bear with me for just a moment for a wee bit of simple maths:
>1 pack of Newport/Marlboro/American Spirit: ~10$ (give or take a bit)
>therefore, 1 carton: ~100$
BUT, pic related costs about 50 bucks, and boxes of 200 empty filtered cigarette tubes run ~2-5 bucks, depending on brand. (They all work just as good, so it's basically whichever ones you like the vibe of)
Loose tobacco varies wildly, but the stuff that goes for ~40$ / lb is perfectly acceptable, so we'll go with that for this example.
One cigarette will contain somewhere between 0.6 and 1.2 grams of tobacco depending on various manufacturing variables, so we'll go with 0.8 grams as a good average.
>1 pound = 16 ounces = 453.692 grams (1 ounce = 28.3496 grams)
Therefore, in theory, one pound of tobacco should make 566.99 cigarettes.
So, You'd have to purchase 3 boxes of tubes to use one pound of tobacco.
Thus:
>1 machine: 50$
>3 boxes tubes at 3$ each: 9$
>1 pound tobacco: 40$
>Total: 99$ excluding taxes
So, you just made 28 packs of cigarettes for ~3.5$ / pack, and that's WITH the cost of the machine. It paid for itself on the very first run, and these things are built like a tank, so you won't have to replace it for years.
Excluding the cost of the machine,
>3 boxes tubes at 3$/each: 9$
>1 pound tobacco: 40$
That's 1.75$ / pack.

Thanks for reading my big rant about how cigarettes don't have to be nearly as expensive as some people think.

>>33787572
>1. What is the original pagan concept of sacrifice vs the Israelite one?
That's a trick question because the hebrews basically were pagan or pagan-ish in the beginning, in other words, they weren't really jews as we know them today until abraham or moses. Remember that abraham and his idea of not sacrificing people was a new idea (even to him). That implies human sacrifice wasn't unheard of in his area. The hebrews were infamous for worshipping other gods (which is why the first 2 or 3 commandments specifically address that).
Pagan is also an incredibly broad term as it covers more than just one religion and a wide geographic area.
You'll need to be more specific, in terms of time and place, if you want a better answer.
>2. Why is the Tripitaka called that?
I'm not an expert on bhuddist terminology. What is the answer to that one?
